name: CreateNewTeam
description:
Create a new team with users and escalation policies.

This tool should be called to create a new team within an organization in PagerDuty. A team includes a collection of users and escalation policies. Requires proper OAuth scope for execution.

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: The versioning information for the API passed in the 'Accept' header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specify the content type as 'application/json' for the request header.

parameters.name: team_details_json
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the team to be created, including users and escalation policies.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
